title: Porphyrin metabolism and carbon fixation response of Skeletonema costatum at different growth phases to mixed emerging PFASs at environmental concentrations
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00137K, Paper
Xiaofeng Li, Yongzheng Ma, Ying Zhang, Xiaohan Zhang, Hongyu Li, Yueling Sun, Zhiguang Niu
Mixed emerging PFASs at environmental concentrations could inhibit the occurrence of marine red tides by down-regulating photosynthesis and GSH metabolism.
